title: Actor Gary Oldman is divorced from his fourth wife
text:
Actor Gary Oldman is divorced from his fourth wife Actor Gary Oldman is divorced from his fourth wife 
Gary Oldman has agreed to pay his fourth wife a £2.2 million divorce settlement. 
The Oscar-nominated English actor split from singer Alexandra Edenborough after six years of marriage. 
He is keeping two properties and several vehicles and will pay his ex 3.3 million dollars (£2.2 million). Gary Oldman has been married four times (Paul A Hebert/Invision) 
The couple tied the knot on New Year’s Eve in 2008. 
They separated in mid-2014 before Alexandra filed for divorce in January this year. 
Gary was married to actress Leslie Manville from 1987 to 1989 and they have a son Alfie together. 
The 57-year-old then went on to marry Hollywood actress Uma Thurman in 1990 but the relationship broke down after two years. Uma Thurman was married to Gary Oldman for two years (Sean Zanni/AP) 
He tied the knot for the third time with model and photographer Donya Fiorentino. 
They had two sons, Gulliver and Charlie, before splitting in 2001. Share article 
Gary was nominated for an Oscar for his role in Tinker Tailor Solider Spy in 2011 and also starred in the Harry Potter films as Sirius Black. Promoted Stories
